attributes.action: Stop people claiming benefits unless they have paid into the system for at least 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would stop people taking the easy option of not bothering to get a job. The idea being that you have to pay tax and National Insurance for at least 5 years before you can take any money out in the form of a benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
